newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Taiwan Food Bureau to tender 15,470 tonnes wheat.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan Food Bureau to tender 15,470 tonnes wheat.

text.p: Taiwan's Provincial Food Bureau will tender on August 28 for a 15,470-tonne shipment of U.S. No.1 wheat, grain traders said on Wednesday.
The shipment would be slated for delivery from the Pacific Northwest between October 1 to 20.
Traders said the Food Bureau was tendering on behalf of Taiwan's military and that such tenders usually are placed quietly once a year.
Traders said the shipment would comprise 7,700 tonnes of hard red winter wheat and 7,770 tonnes of another variety, apparently either soft wheat or spring wheat.
